name: William's Legacy
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move character

QE - Rotate character

Space - Confirm

ESC - Open Pause menu

I - Open inventory (Click the cards to open equip menu)

M - Mute music

Plot:

The games starts right in the first stage. We are introduced to Sir William III. He doesn't remember how he got there. After looking around he sees a strange figure laying in the ground unconscious. Weird, that figure looks just like him. An imposter perhaps.

He kicks him and shouts:

"Hey you, imposter! Who are you?!"

The strange figure wakes up and rapidly gets up, pointing his rifle at Sir William.

"Wha- Who the hell are you?! And where are we?! Tell me before I blast you!"

"I'm Sir William III, a noble hero from my beloved kingdom! And you, imposter, what is your name? Tell me me before I slay you with my blade!"

"HAHAHAHAH! With that tiny knife?! You know that I can kill you in one shot."

"What do you mean 'shot'? What kind of bow is that? And you didn't tell me your name yet!"

"I'm Captain Will, a.k.a. "One Shot Kill". And this 'bow' is the most powerful gun in the army, it can modify into any weapon, with the right parts."

"Not very humble, are you?"

"Humbleness is for fools... Wait... Your face... You have my face!"

"No! YOU have my face! You must be a monster. I heard stories about them!"

"Monsters don't exist fool! You must be a spy trying to infiltrate my army!"

They both prepare to fight when suddenly a big portal opens in front of them.

A large figure appears. He looks at the two of them.

"Oh... This is interesting. Looks like I have summoned the same person from two different worlds. Well, it's okay. clears throat I am the Dual Master and I have a proposal for you two. I will grant you infinite power, in return, you give me your 'Contrast'."

Sir William III swings his sword at him:

"I would never make a deal with a demon!"

Captain Will points his gun at Dual Master:

"I have never seen that kind of technology before. But more importantly, that deal seems shady as hell. So no."

"Well, I tried. Looks like I'll have to lock you in here, forever."

"Wh-"

Before they knew, the Dual Master disappeared into another portal.

Sir William says:

"He's gone. And what was that about 'two different worlds'?"

"Doesn't matter! We'll have to fight our way outta here! What about a temporary truce?"

"Fine by me!"

The game starts.
